channel.title: [KEYGEN] I hate rectangles
channel.description:
..they are so edgy :thinking:
Last time I gave up too much information with the title so here we are. GL&HF :stuck_out_tongue:
## Difficulty
**Author Assigned Level: Wannabe**
**Community Assigned Level:** [poll type=regular results=on_vote] * Newbie * Wannabe * Hacker * Wizard * Guru [/poll] --- ## Goals
1. Find a working key and password pair. 2. Create a non-brute keygen.
---
## Rules
1. No patching allowed!
---
## Binaries
For executables use `cat in | base64 -d | gunzip > a.out && chmod +x a.out`, chmod is only required for linux binary.
* windows (mingw-w64 in path required): https://pastebin.com/36JyfcDh * linux: https://pastebin.com/gN8C7HAC * more sources are available in hints :wink:
If you need a windows binary but don't have a linux subystem to decode it, lmk in the comments and I will provide the full executable.
---
## Hints
If you need minimal help, use 2.
0. .jar: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9v2f9bc6wj4r001/jar.jar.gz?dl=1 just gunzip it, jdk8 required, beware of decompiling because the file is quite large 1. .cpp: https://pastebin.com/uyRu1Zff 2. [spoiler]https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Convex_hull[/spoiler]

item.title: [KEYGEN] I hate rectangles
item.dc:creator: wex-ler
item.description:
…they are so edgy

Last time I gave up too much information with the title so here we are. GL&HF

Difficulty

Author Assigned Level: Wannabe

Community Assigned Level:

Click to view the poll.

Goals

  1. Find a working key and password pair.
  2. Create a non-brute keygen.

Rules

  1. No patching allowed!

Binaries

For executables use cat in | base64 -d | gunzip > a.out && chmod +x a.out, chmod is only required for linux binary.

  • windows (mingw-w64 in path required): https://pastebin.com/36JyfcDh
  • linux: https://pastebin.com/gN8C7HAC
  • more sources are available in hints

If you need a windows binary but don’t have a linux subystem to decode it, lmk in the comments and I will provide the full executable.

Hints

If you need minimal help, use 2.

  1. .jar: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9v2f9bc6wj4r001/jar.jar.gz?dl=1 just gunzip it, jdk8 required, beware of decompiling because the file is quite large
  2. .cpp: https://pastebin.com/uyRu1Zff
  3. spoiler

Read full topic
